jump_scares.spoiler: After Laurie says goodbye to Allyson there is a loud gunshot as the scene abruptly cuts to Laurie shooting some targets
After a boy is left alone in the car by his father, the boy is startled by a bang on the passenger window
A gun discharges after the boy prods the cop lying on the ground
As the boy begins to drive away, Michael appears in the back seat
Ray opens the door startling Karen. Immediately after this Laurie yells “gotcha” on the stairs startling both Ray and Karen
Vicky is startled by her boyfriend (who scares her as a joke) after going outside to empty the trash
Vicky jumps out of Julian’s bedroom screaming (as a joke) after pretending to be abducted
Vicky tries to close the closet door but it won’t close. Suddenly Michael walks out and attacks Vicky
Sheriff Hawkings startles Laurie from behind
The motion sensor light turns back on and Oscar is suddenly attacked by Michael
Ray opens the door to the police car and sees two bloodied and dead police officers
Laurie waits by the door for Michael when his hand suddenly bursts through a glass panel and grabs her
After seeing a trail of blood, Laurie opens a closet door and finds Ray’s dead body
Mike appears from behind one of the mannequins

movies.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

jump_scares.spoiler: The presumed dead man suddenly grabs Helen
The drowning man suddenly opens his eyes, startling Barry
Missy appears behind Julie and Helen
Helen turns around and is startled by a hanging coat
Missy bangs on the car window
Elsa puts her hand on Helen’s shoulder
Julie opens the car boot and sees Max’s corpse covered in crabs
Missy approaches Julie with a knife
The killer jumps out from underneath a plastic sheet and attacks Helen. [Video]
The killer suddenly appears behind Helen
A corpse slides down in front of Julie
Julie puts her hand on the face of another corpse
A dark figure crashes through the door. [Video]
The title card appears abruptly on the screen accompanied by a scream. [Video]
The gas station attendant suddenly appears in front of Holden
Holden removes a painting from the wall to reveal a window with Dana standing behind it
The cellar door opens by itself
Jules is stabbed in the hand while having sex
An agitated Curt suddenly appears beside Marty
Something punches through the cabin wall
A zombie breaks through the window and grabs Marty
A zombie hand comes through the window in Dana’s room
Holden is stabbed in the back by a zombie
Holden is stabbed in the neck while driving
The father zombie bangs his chain down in front of Dana
Dana puts her face up to a window and a werewolf lunges at the glass from the other side. [Video]
Maxine is looking at the kitchen, when the old lady appears behind her
As Maxine is running through the grass away from the house, Wayne suddenly grabs her
After RJ starts driving, the old woman appears in front of the car
Something is pushed through the hole in the wall, Wayne is looking through
After Lorraine pulls the trigger for the lightbulb, there is a sudden cut to Wayne getting the spikes pulled out of his head
Lorraine turns on the light and the naked, cuffed body of RJ is shown
Howard suddenly appears in front of Jackson
Maxine realizes who is laying next to her and screams
Bobby-Lynn opens the door and sees the old woman running towards her
While Lorraine is trying to unlock the door, her hand gets smashed by the owner of the house
The woman slaps Bobby-Lynn after she’s trying to help her
Bobby-Lynn is thrown into the lake
A crocodile attacks Bobby-Lynn
Lorraine jumps up from behind the door and screams
When Lorraine runs out of the house, she gets shot from the side
Lorraine makes a surprising noise which scares Howard
